full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal: Applications Sustainment Services

* Solicitation Number: W8486-228518/A
* Publication Date: December 30, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: February 22, 2023, 14:00:00
* Procuring Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* End-User Entity: Department of National Defence
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Overview
Public Works and Government Services Canada invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for the Applications Sustainment Services requirement as part of the Land Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Intelligence, Surveillance & Reconnaissance (LC4ISR) Capability sustainment services. This is the third/request for proposal (RFP) in a series of four.

The procurement is subject to the National Security Exception and is limited to Canadian suppliers only.

#### Essential Requirements
The successful bidder must:

1. Meet the security requirements outlined in the Security Requirement Check List (SRCL) and security clauses as specified in the RFP.
2. Comply with the requirements related to Foreign Ownership, Control and Influence (FOCI).

#### Key Documents
Available at:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/31/fba98197321ace391e9ea74384561386/ABES.PROD.PW__RA.B062.E28906.EBSU004.PDF

#### Tender Evaluation
Tenders will be evaluated based on the Best Overall Proposal strategy.

#### Important Notes
- The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
- The selected winning bidder must complete and submit a FOCI Questionnaire and associated documentation prior to contract award.

Please visit the follow link to review the overall security requirement for contracting with Canada: [https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/esc-src/index-eng.html](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/esc-src/index-eng.html)
